column1: Sample depths were 30 m, 60 m, 130 m, 300 m, and 1, 000 m at station 2 and 30 m, 85 m, 100 m, 300 m, and 1, 000 m at station 6, which represented samples from the surface mixed layer, upper oxycline, OMZ core and lower oxycline at either station respectively.
